txt.en: You are a chicken. For the most part your life is carefree and easy, within the safety of your coop you only need to deal with the rooster who is all about keeping the pecking order in-line. Yet, out there, in the big wide world there are bigger dangers, much bigger dangers.\n\nExercise caution as you make your way through the wild world.
Enjoy the wide world as a chicken.
Take your time to speak with the animal, walk with the animals, talk to the animals.
Do your best not to die, that would be bad.
